body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Arthur Simmons and the customer's name is Betty Cox.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Arthur Simmons, and I represent MetaCar, your trusted car rental agency.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Arthur, my name is Betty Cox.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Betty! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having some issues with my recent rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Betty. Could you please provide me with the rental reservation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Could you also confirm the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I see your reservation now. Can you please explain the issue you're experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The car wasn't in the condition I expected when I picked it up.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Betty. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We strive to provide great service.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Arthur.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
